effect.diamond_pearl: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
effect.platinum: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
short_effect.platinum: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Prevents the target from leaving battle.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user blocks the foe’s way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.
flavor_text.platinum: The user blocks the foe’s way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user blocks the foe’s way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.
